long_description: With an amber lens that's great for overcast days, the Anon Helix Non-Mirror snow goggles deliver contrast and definition so clouds won't overshadow your ability to really shred some lines. Amber lens offers 55% visible light transmission to deliver excellent contrast, shadow definition and depth perception in flat, cloudy light. Antifog treatment and full-perimeter venting combat lens fogging, delivering clear vision in changing weather. Dual-layer face foam supplies a comfortable, snug seal around your face. Tough thermoplastic polyurethane frame offers consistent flexibility in changing temperatures. The helmet-compatible design of the Anon Helix Non-Mirror snow goggles fits smaller- to medium-size faces; goggles come with a microfiber storage bag.
short_description: With an amber lens that's great for overcast days, the Anon Helix Non-Mirror snow goggles deliver contrast and definition so clouds won't overshadow your ability to really shred some lines.
